amendment.description: Amendment allows States to provide assistance to local educational agencies and eligible partnerships to develop innovative professional development programs that train teachers to use technology.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 3 printed in H.Rept. 106-240 to authorize the use of funds to develop and implement professional development programs to train teachers to use technology to improve teaching and learning.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castle amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
